website_summaries.verdict: A smaller Bonsaii shredder that is good for household or smaller shredding on a daily basis.
pros: Drawer pulls out from the side instead of the front
Cross cuts the paper into small pieces
cons: This unit is designed to only run for 10 minutes before needing a cool-down time, which makes it much less of a work horse than other Bonsaii models

customer_reviews.title: This shredder worked for six months of light use. ...
customer_reviews.text: This shredder worked for six months of light use. Cleaning out my office this weekend and doing some shredding, consistently putting 6-8 pages at a time when suddenly the unit jammed. As much as I tried tweezers, scissors etc to remove paper I could not get it up and running. I was really surprised to see the order date for this shredder was only 6 months ago. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaB

customer_reviews.title: ZERO STARS! DO NOT BUY THIS SHREDDER!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is a total piece of junk. It did not even last three months. I have included a picture of the big hunks of paper that I pulled out of the shredder when I had to take it apart after it kept jamming. I did not come close to putting 12 sheets of paper in it that it claims it could handle. I also used lubricating sheets which seem to make no difference. My last shredder lasted for years (not a Bonsaii) so I don’t think it’s me. I wish I had my $75 back. Not to mention the time I’ve spent unjamming it.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as 30 minutes operation but Manual says use only for 2!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shredder because it is advertised as allowing for up to 30 minutes continuing running time. When I opened the package and read the instruction package, it said "Important Note: This device is designed solely for private use indoors and for brief operation not exceeding 2 minutes." Is this a 30 minute run time machine or not? Later on its says: "To protect the machine, we suggest the following use pattern: work 2 minutes then rest 30 minutes...." I also note the instruction Manual has lines on the side of the print similar to a word document that is being edited. Amazon what gives here?
customer_reviews.author: mikey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my old shredder and read the reviews on this model. The best feature is the handle to lift up the engine to empty the bin. Simply genius. My old shredder did not have this and it was hard, even with nails, to remove the engine to empty the bin. This model is smaller than my old, office supply store model. It is nice looking all around so that you can leave it by the side of your desk or fits underneath a cabinet without taking much space. As far as the noise level, it's loud but it is a shredder. I feel this a great value and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gershenson

customer_reviews.title: Paying over $100 for a shredder that DOES WORK would be PRICELESS!!!  BUT not this product
customer_reviews.text: Bonsaii EverShred 14-Sheet Cross-Cut Heavy Duty Paper Shredder with 30 Minutes Continuous running time (C169-B) Received this shredder a month ago. Within this month, we vacationed for 8 days. We shred sensitive mail. Used maybe 5 times to shred no more than 2 sheets at a time. Last evening I tried to shred an 8 1/2" x 11" piece of paper. The shredder stopped 2/3 of the way through the process. It would not move forward or back, it jammed. This produce does not live up to the description. I would never try to shred 10 to 14 pieces of paper. Very dissatisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Needs stronger motor
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a home paper shredder. It was a nice compact size. I bought it, on the first try, shredded only 3-4 pages at a time, with breaks in between, and only about 15 sheets total. By the end, I thought my pages were going to get stuck, the motor sounded like it was struggling and slowing. When I finished, yes it did finish, I flipped it over and saw all the paper stuck in the motor already. I felt, if it's already sounding struggling within the first few trying, I better find a different one. I returned it. Maybe Its how it is or maybe I got a bad one. Not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Geebin Mak

customer_reviews.title: Overheated and shut down, wastebasket is flimsy -- If you're smart, you'll pass this up!
customer_reviews.text: After only a few minutes' use (of just a few sheets at a time), this thing overheated and completely shut down. Also, the wastebasket that fits into the assembly that holds the actual shredder blades, is very flimsy. (I have a different brand, older version -- but made the same way -- and it isn't flimsy at all.) At this point, the only good thing about this is that it does a great job of shredding into very tiny pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Mason's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I like how quiet this shredder is. Using it to shred personal papers. Works great. Don't like the slide-out drawer as it makes it hard to put in a small trash bag for collecting shredded waste.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.title: Value for the $$
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is on the small side; however, it is competent. The eight sheets of paper that the vendor claims are verified. I would buy again if the reasonable time elapsed and I needed another, and I'd recommend you buy this model if you don't already have a viable solution in your home office. It's a bit on the noisy side, but that is the case with any cross-cut shredder. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: ckluis221100

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother Buying!
customer_reviews.text: I used this shredder twice (purchased it April 2019). I went to use it yesterday (June 11, 2019) and nothing! It won't turn on; checked everything possible and the machine just won't work. Sent email to Seller and they wrote back right away asking all kinds of questions; like, does the reverse button work, is the power light on, is the machine plugged in. THE MACHINE DOESN'T WORK! We'll see if they send me a new machine or refund the money!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Absolute waste of money- does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: Utterly useless! This paper shredder did not work for even one minute- it never even turned on! I called their customer service four times, and either they didn't answer, or a machine picked up and put me on hold, kept me waiting, then asked me to leave a voice message , which was not possible because the voice mailbox was full . I would not buy anything from this company ever!! What a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is so quiet compared to my old shredder that broke. I run it even at night when my children are asleep and they have no idea. The only thing that I don’t care for is that it cuts the papers into strips so I can only put the papers into the machine in one direction otherwise someone could still read my personal information. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mom

customer_reviews.title: well made it thru the warranty period
customer_reviews.text: went to dump this today we bought in jan 2018, found a huge part of the cutter holder in the bottom, All the screws that were put in to hold this is cracked out around every one of the screws, We are 2 adults house hold, we only shred statements, not cleaning out 7 years of taxes or any thing like that. My $19.00 one lasted longer than this. Cuts good but is falling apart now. I think maybe we have emptied the basket 7 or 8 times is all. And always used the lube sheet amazon suggested to buy with this putting thru every other basket. If your looking for some thing that lasts a bit longer keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT AT ITS JOB
customer_reviews.text: My Bonsail crosscut 12 sheet paper shredder is wonderful. It arrived in great condition. I put it right to work shredding old tax papers from my parent's estate (they died many years ago.) It worked well and finished the job in no time. I recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good home shredder
customer_reviews.text: I have a few years of things to shred, and it did overheat after a few sets of paper but it came back to life.
customer_reviews.author: clairehand

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are misleading, might be for different model
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and it is not as jam free as I thought. I will write again after a larger load. One thing that disappoints me about Amazon is that the reviews under this product are for several different models. I did not notice this when I bought the shredder. Only the reviews for the C169-B should be listed.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in good working condition. Noise level is average and not any quieter than other home shredders. It is compact in size which is nice and has a nice bucket to hold the shredded papers. The opening/slot where you feed the paper is the same exact size as the width of a sheet of paper and therefore you have to make sure that you insert the sheet of paper exactly in the slot, otherwise, it will not go through the slot. My shredder broke down less than a month after I purchased it --- it would run continuously and the shredder would not stop. It was returned.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I should have read the details on the shredder closer. It does overheat after 3 minutes and shuts off (this is an inconvenience). It shreds the paper 1/4’’. When shredding CDs or CCs it shreds them in 1.5” stripes. It’s the perfect size and doesn’t take up room in my studio.
customer_reviews.author: teo

customer_reviews.title: It does jam fairly easily.
customer_reviews.text: I put in a folded piece of paper and it jammed. I tried the reverse button to get it to back out, but it didn't. I used something to push it through on the other side. Otherwise it's a good little shredder
customer_reviews.author: Robin B

customer_reviews.title: Did not work so can not  give a fair assessment
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rate this product is being good because it did not work right out of the box when I get everything the instructions including troubleshooting. I returned it immediately I would not recommend it if their quality control does not do better. Thank you Amazon for standing behind your guarantee if a product is not suitable or does not work. I'm very pleased with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LADYBUG

customer_reviews.title: Overall, this has nice combination of good shredding and small size
customer_reviews.text: Good value for micro cut. I used forward button to shred lots of paper, each feed 4 pages. Easily 30 pages, sometimes over 100 pages until overheat light came on. The trick is not to let shredded paper to touch the bottom of cutting blades and keep them free of paper debris proper to next paper feeding. The con: wish to have a bottom extension of the bin, large for shredding but small for storage; more than 4 pages per feed will accelerate overheating and also slow down the shredding. Good for home and small business.
customer_reviews.author: Coast

customer_reviews.title: Maggie's Shred Central
customer_reviews.text: Remember those cute little checks that come with your credit card statement encouraging you to transfer balances and/or spend money that you really don't have? I had in excess of a five-year backlog of those bad boys. Now they are tiny little shards of paper that can no longer tempt me. Bonsai and I have created Maggie's personal Shred Central -- open 24-7-365 (or 366 in leap years). Excellent product and the addition of the sharpening/oiling sheets was a great selection (if I must say so myself). I have had shredders prior to this one and not one has been as efficient at light to medium shredding as this one. Got to go, today's mail is ready for disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M. White

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as tough as the description but well supported by the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and used it for almost a year. It broke as though it had been overstuffed - but it had not. I had bought an Asurion 4-year coverage contract with it. They were unhelpful. I called Asurion who diverted me to the supplier. I called the supplier (supply chimp) who failed to respond for a long time. When Supply Chimp responded they referred me to the manufacturer - Bonsaii. They were VERY HELPFUL and are sending a replacement free of charge. I am very satisfied with Bonsaii. I cannot say the same for Asurion who were worthless and a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and has wheels
customer_reviews.text: Shreds very well. I thought it would be a little larger. I like the take out basket to dispose of paper. And it also has wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Praiser

customer_reviews.title: Schredder is a pieces of junk
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of junk. Does not do what the description said it would. It's supposed to take up to 14 pages at one time, yet it has trouble with just 4 or 5 gages. Then the fan comes on to prevent it from over heating after on a few min ties. Would take forever to do a large amount of mail. As it stands right now l would never buy another one of your products and will certanly tell my friends about my experience. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: what a mess
customer_reviews.text: update you have to be careful not to overfill the bin. Shreds will will back up into the mechanism and it is a tremendous pain to remove them. you do not have access to the mechanism so you end up reaching in and un-plugging with your hand. it packs pretty tight and is not easy to remove. I purchased this shredder because I was tired of dealing with the shreds that fell on the floor when emptying. I find that there are still shreds on the floor, but not as many. Some of the shreds do not make it into the bin and end up on the floor. pro: quiet con: slow
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: excellent deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I received my shredder within two days, set it up and tried it out immediately after reading the instructions--- it really works great and helps me shred my unwanted mail and cards efficiently
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vallero

customer_reviews.title: Bought this Back in June 2019/No Support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and worked great. I used this once a month. I just tried using it a few days ago and does not turn on. I had a cheaper model that lasted me years that would overheat after 5-10 minutes of use. This thing does not turn on. I checked every outlet in the room. Tested the outlets with my electrical tester checks out fine and there is current. I emailed their support and have not heard nothing back. First time purchasing Bonsaii, last time I will ever purchase Bonsaii products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wish it had wheels
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when I bought this that it didn't have wheels so when I move it I have to pick it up and carry it. I hadn't purchased a new shredder in several years so the noise level to me seems ok. Ease of use is good and it will shred several pages at once. Overall, I would say it's a good shredder but I wouldn't purchase if you want wheels. If you don't mind that it doesn't have wheels, it's a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Michelle Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We'd been using the shredder for a while, then began to have a problem with it. I contacted the email-based Customer Service and found a very responsive, helpful group. They provided really clear troubleshooting instructions ... with pictures! It allowed me to learn about the problem, and I figured out how to resolve it. They went further to offer some replacement part in hopes to make things even easier in future, but I declined, being entirely satisfied with the solution that we figured out together. When one buys online, one is never sure whether the product really will be supported or not. This product is fully supported!
customer_reviews.author: Max Walker

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!! So loud!!! But still works great
customer_reviews.text: I am knocking a star for what an loud awful sound this makes. This shredder was purchased for a work environment, and coworkers actually say it sounds like someone is running a chain saw every time I use it in my office. Other than the noise, the shredder works great.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G

customer_reviews.title: installation of casters
customer_reviews.text: When installing the casters, a simple push down to click in place, be sure the unit is laying on its side as the first thing I did was stand the unit upside down and there happens to be four small clips on top and one simply snapped off. The unit is pretty short verses the office unit I use. The plastic is pretty thin so without one clip will probably be a challenge in removing the drawer to empty and get back in place. Runs quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Quieter than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: This shredder works well. I ran some cardboard through it and it didn't skip a beat. Plus it is way more quiet than I thought. I had a cheap old strip shredder that would make you grab the ear plugs, but not this one. I've got a log of old documents to shred and based on the performance with cardboard I don't think I will have a problem. It can also shred credit cards and CD/DVD's but I haven't tried those functions yet.
customer_reviews.author: James Barfield

customer_reviews.title: Compact but sturdy unit.
customer_reviews.text: Compact but seems to be a sturdy unit. Easy to see how full the bin is but there is a light to let you know when to dump the contents. Shreds into nice small pieces and you can feed numerous sheets into it at once. I like it has a switch to turn off the power when not in use. There is a switch for auto on when it senses paper being inserted into it. Noise level isn't bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: JED

customer_reviews.title: Product Received - Not as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: The paper shredder was small enough to fit under my desk however, it overheats too easily. I used the machine four times and it broke. Unfortunately, I could not return the item because it broke seven days after my return period. It was fine the first three times. The overheat protection stops the machine, which was described, but the fourth time it didn't go back on. The shredder I purchased showed a handle, the item I received had no handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality shredder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to replace an old Fellowes shredder that did not have a removable drawer. I am very disappointed in this purchase. The light that indicates a paper jam is the same light for overheating. By the time that light goes off, the shredder is so jammed, it needs major time and effort to get it going again. I am talking 45-60 minutes to remove the jam. The frame of the machine is so fragile that one wheel broke off while moving it across a tile floor. I truly regret not spending the extra $$ to buy a comparable Fellowes machine. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Lianne S. Greve

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased another microshredder and it was too top heavy and fell onto my foot, so it was important to find a shredder that wouldn't tip on a carpeted floor. This one is shorter than the other, so it is less likely to "teeter". It's not as heavy as my previous two, which I like, and my favorite feature is the handle on top! There's nothing worse than having to lift a heavy lid to empty the bin with nothing to grip. I haven't tested the capability of credit card shredding but it handled my usual stuff just fine. Should anything change, I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: BookSurfer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Most shredders advertise x sheets and start choking at x-2. This one is the opposite in that it shreds better than advertised (probably up to 16 sheets). So far I shredded about 20 bankers boxes worth of documents without a single paper jam. Highly recommended headache-free shredding. Edit: this is not a "vine review". I bought this with my own money at full price. It was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: sgunes

customer_reviews.title: Relatively quiet.
customer_reviews.text: *Nice shredder which really shreds small. *Will shred a lot of sheets at one time within its limits. *Relatively quiet *I like the pull out front when the shredded paper is full and needs dumping. *Much better than the ones where you have to remove the top shredder top. Best shredder I have had for the money. I gave up on the cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Overall it shreds as noted
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast & was well packaged. I thought it was going to be slightly larger than it was. Very lightweight & castles make it easy to maneuver. However, the waste drawer is a little flimsy - it helps to roll the unit with a hand supporting the drawer front. Shredded quickly. Slightly less noise than my previous one, but I'm not sure I would agree that it's quiet, per se. It is cross cutting & there will be shredding noise. I personally do not feel it is worth the high price, but the offer had a discount coupon & I had a gift card. I ended up paying much less. Oversll , it works well & hasn't jammed.
customer_reviews.author: Loraine

customer_reviews.title: Pay more for a better machine.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 6 page shredder. Was excited to use this but very underpowered. Barely has any power to shred 2 sheets at the same time let alone 6. Gets to overheating after 10-15 page use. I would suggest get the 6 sheet only if you are going to barely use this for minor office use and to shred some mail here and there. 1 to 2 sheets Max!! Otherwise you are going to have a bad time.
customer_reviews.author: nisx

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice now since I received it, and so far, it's great! It's soooooooo much quieter than my last cheap paper shredder that I bought way back in 1998 or so. It's got a large shred bin; easily handled 10 pages; ate a credit card like it was not even there, and so far, hasn't shown a single defect or draw back. Too soon to tell how long it'll last, but it looks like I'll have this for 20 years or so as I did with my last one.
customer_reviews.author: SRaisch

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Decent shredder at a good price. Small see-through window in the basket lets you know it's filling up. Be sure to follow the work/rest instructions. You can't run a relatively inexpensive shredder like this for a long time without giving it a chance to cool down. And limit the number of sheets you feed through at a time, also per the instructions. Doing these things should assure longevity. My last inexpensive cross-cut shredder lasted almost 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Blue11

customer_reviews.title: Bought it used and it has worked great
customer_reviews.text: This machine is worth getting when put up against the plethora of other cheap paper shredders. I was apprehensive about getting another shredder after having a different brand shredder give out after just a few uses, but with this unit marked down I gave it a shot. I am very glad that I did and easily handles 2 and 3 normal sheets of paper at a time. The feeder works well, but I guess the only issue I have run into is sometimes I have to angle the paper into the cutter for the feeder to engage. I don't see it as a problem though, and its probably a safety feature so the feeder doesn't engage too easily.
customer_reviews.author: phantomrose22

customer_reviews.title: a good value even if the shred is larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: With my background in Navy Communications ... this device is not what I would call a cross-cut shredder. That said ... It is pretty much as described in the write up. I just scanned over the size since I thought I knew what everyone called a cross-cut shredder. The shred pieces are larger than what I expected. But for normal household stuff it works well and is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Somerindyke

customer_reviews.title: Has some nice features
customer_reviews.text: This paper shredder takes 14 sheets at a time, which is nice. I put some unopened thick junk mail in and it chugs away and shreds it up nicely. It has a cooling fan that runs almost constantly. It also has an overheat light so you know when to stop shredding for a while. It is small enough to comfortably lift and move around, but big enough to hold quite a bit of shredded papers. It makes some noise but they all do. If paper is too thick it will start backing up before it gets stuck. All in all I like it, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hambone99

customer_reviews.title: Great cross cut shredder!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder works like a charm. The crosshredded pieces are small which is what I was looking for. I have used it to shred several papers at once, but I have not yet tried the max 6 pages yet. But so far it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shredder For The Price
customer_reviews.text: WOW, For the money I honestly didn’t expect this quality. This thing shreds paper like no tomorrow. I shredded several boxes of bills and other items without a hiccup. I used to have to open envelopes, take out the contents, and shred several pieces at a time with the old shredder we owned. This one just put the envelopes in the middle of the slot and away they go. And since it’s a crosscut you don’t have to worry about someone trying to put pieces back together. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: OldSchool

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shredder. It is quiet and gets the job done. If you are doing a large job of shredding you might have to empty it quite often but that is a small thing compared to other features of this shredder. It is quiet and can run a long time before the operator must shut down for cooling. I do not recommend shredding credit cards as they might get stuck as this happened with my previous shredder so no matter what shredder I happen to use I will not shred any cards. I would recommend this purchase to any one who needs a shredder, I am happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Fine... for small time shredding.
customer_reviews.text: This paper shredder did not meet my expectations. Perhaps better said... I had higher expectations for this shredder. ++ It does a nice cross cut ++ It's has a small footprint --- It has a small, teeny little motor that can't handle more than 2 or 3 pages at a time. *** This shredder is fine if all you have are a few receipts and cancelled checks. I don't think it will last very long. I'm going to stuff it as much as I can... until it croaks. Then I'll go buy a real, big boy shredder!
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Lalli

customer_reviews.title: Mostly works
customer_reviews.text: I know it's not high end or powerful. I've fed it 4-6 sheets at a time, and it sometimes bogs down. Not really a machine designed to get through a backlog, more for the occasional statement. Probably the biggest disappointment is that the shreds are between 1/4 inch and 2 inches. Pretty inconsistent, and since I wanted confetti, it's disappointing. Update: Revised to 3 stars Fed 1 sheet of shiny paper through, and got the desired micro cut. So it CAN work it fed a proper diet (low fiber).
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder, but failed after 7 months :(
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about my Bonsaii shredder right up until the day it stopped working. It was quiet, powerful and (I thought) reliable. Then the power light went out and that was the end of it. I contacted the manufacturer, will update this review if/when I get a response. UPDATE: I did receive a response from Bonsai within two days with a troubleshooting procedure and assurance that my machine is in warranty. So far, I don't have a working shredder but expect that my problem will be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: BSquared

customer_reviews.title: Spending 93$ for this one time use shredder
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shredder on Dec 29, 2019, the price was 93$. After only a few times used. it can not turn on anymore. I am trying to find customer service since this shredder still under a one-year warranty, but the only option is to call them, no online chat, nor email. I have to wait to reach out to the customer service agent for a few hours. eventually, someone answered my phone and sent an email to me. she said they will send me a replacement after I reply to the email with my order information, and then they will reply during 48 hours. I followed the instruction, email sent on 09/29. and nobody reply.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to empty and oh so quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Great little shredder! I like having the drawer slide out! You don't have to lift off the heavy shredding mechanism like ypu do with most machines! It does NOT jam hardly at all. I've been using it for over a month now and haven't had it jam once! I don't have to remove staples unless there are over the recommended number of pages in the group. Like I said, emptying it is a breeze. Hardly any mess with this one and did I mention how quiet this is? What a blessing!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia in FL

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: The shredder is adequate size as micro cut. It is quiet. The best thing is you can use it for 30 minutes and then let it rest. I purchased another shredder that you could only run 3 minutes and rest 6 minutes. That did not work for me for even home office use. I consider it a good value for the money and recommend for anyone with normal home office use.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great In The Beginning
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shredder in the beginning. It shreds great, really small pieces. I was able to put a garbage bag around the pull out drawer. BUT, the auto shut off stopped working after a few weeks. So you can't keep it on to shred whenever you want. I have to turn it off and on every time I use it. Not sure if it's just a malfunction with this part. I don't have time to be running down the manufacturer for bad parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shredder for the home or small office.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th paper shredder I've owned. It is also the best. It truly shreds 10 sheets of paper at once and dices them into inch-long bits. It has a long run time, in fact I've never overheated it. It's simple to operate and easy to empty. I would not have it plugged in around small children, but that's probably a good idea with all shredders. I like this one so much that I bought an identical model to give someone as a gift. The shredder is not the fastest I've used, but because it eats 10 pages at a time without jamming, it's the most reliable one I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Dalai Mama

customer_reviews.title: Performs flawlessly with a little oil & fan to cool the exhaust port.
customer_reviews.text: LIKES : It's a legit work horse. Silicone oiled it before use. Buttery smooth operation. Easy to operate & has reverse for unjaming. Used to process outdated paper records containing sensitive bank / investment account info. We ran it for 1 hr intervals 5 min. Cooldowns. 6 hr total time using a fan on the exhaust port. FLAWLESS. DISLIKES : Unit is a bit top heavy until it's filled, so it needs to be stabilized. But this isn't an issue. Highly recommended to protect the disposal of outdated documents.
customer_reviews.author: M. PRESTON

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this when my previous shredder died. So far it's been a champ. I am trying to get in a better habit of scanning and shredding on a more regular basis so it doesn't build up to such a huge pile of paper. I haven't used it for any old cc's yet but I'm sure it will work fine. I like that it's on wheels, I had to build a stand for my other one so I had more maneuverability to tuck it away in it's niche. Overall a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Good shredder for the price
customer_reviews.text: This thing chomps through almost anything. I went on a shredding marathon one night and it stood up without an issue. I was shredding stacks of papers that may or may not have had staples in them and it didn't flinch. This is a pretty good shredder that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Fosbenner

customer_reviews.title: Follow instructions and it should be good
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a shredder for our home. We use it somewhat every day. I’m now in the process of shredding my old papers from a journal and it performs great. It’s perfect for what we use it for. Easy to empty with a pullout bin. I bought oil because it says it should be oiled after so many usages. I wanted to follow instructions and not blame the manufacturer should something go wrong. It’s early in the game but all points to great so far.
customer_reviews.author: KJK

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Proud
customer_reviews.text: Love this compact document/card shredder! It is exactly what I needed in terms of security and privacy. The micro shreds are amazingly tiny and there's no way any thief can put the pieces together! It's pretty loud when in use, but it gets the job done perfectly! I just keep it on Auto mode and it turns off automatically after a few minutes or so of inactivity. And I love the handle bar for ease of lid removal. Cannot complain!!
customer_reviews.author: MaryAngel

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's slower than our previous shredder, and it's a bit more touchy about getting smaller pieces of paper in the right position and deep enough in the slot to get it going, but it's very quiet (nice) and it does the job. I like the design and the capacity of the paper container - it holds a lot and is easy to remove and empty without a mess. Overall I am quite satisfied with this shredder.
customer_reviews.author: DeCoop

customer_reviews.title: Did you come here because your shredders keep breaking? Me too.
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is the real deal, you should get it. I've gone through about 3 shredders, randomly breaking when I use them over 2 or 3 minutes to shred minuscule stacks of mail that contain personal information in them. The last shredder was a 12 sheet shredder, ended up breaking on 3 or 4 sheets of paper. I've had this shredder for several months and not even a hiccup. It eats up the paper like some sort of (quite) woodchipper! Basket is easy to empty too.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I already had a paper shredder and one that shreds credit cards and cds too and it was much bigger but I purchased it 10 years ago and seriously was much cheaper than this one. There was nothing special about it. It was small compared to the one I had so I was confused as to why it was expensive. I was anticipating a bigger and more high tech version but this one just as a switch that goes left to right where as mine had more options.
customer_reviews.author: Naya

customer_reviews.title: Long shred time without overheating
customer_reviews.text: Relatively quiet, easy to empty the bin & you really can shred for several minutes (I didn't test out the 30 minute limit, but close). I've had it less than a week, so hopefully it will remain a quality product with time. Update (December2018): unfortunately, the shredder only works intermittently now and I've had to pull my old one back out to use. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only worked a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Used it once for a large set of bills, and a second time for a couple of envelopes, and it’s never worked again. Bought it in July 2019. It quit working almost immediately. Would never purchase it again. Since this happened with the one I bought before it, I’m extremely upset and disappointed with having it happen a second time. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Koen Parish

customer_reviews.title: A PIECE OF GARBAGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money or your time. I have used this only 2 times before it stopped working. It just shut off after shedding 2 pieces of paper. The shedder was very loud . After shedding the 2 pieces of paper it cut off and didn’t cut back on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good not great. Jams a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I will say that I absolutely love how small it shreds but with that being said it says 8 page capability at a time and it gets jammed if you put in anything more than two at a time!! So absolutely falsely advertised. I have to do single sheets because otherwise you can hear the motor really struggling to continue. The motor is loud regardless. It’s good enough for my small home office needs but today I shredded 10 pages, singles and it Jammed twice... I do not recommend but if you want to get it. I highly suggest getting the insurance as I don’t foresee this item lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Jesss

customer_reviews.title: Excellent...good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight, but does the work. the only negative is that it is very lightweight, so it is awkward to move around, with the weight of the motor. But that's is true of most smaller shredders. The best part is the viewable, drawer-type bin. Well worth the money. Unless needed for an office with oodles of paper to shred, this one does the job. I went through all of last year's paper bills, folder by folder and it never stop or stalled even once.
customer_reviews.author: Alice  Schumm

customer_reviews.title: Great, quiet shredder!!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is one of the quietest shredders I have ever used. The shredder handles its 14 paper max with ease and I have not encountered any jams while using it, even when shredding 8-10 sheets of thick stock paper. The cross cut is not as fine as some other shredders I have used, but it is fine for my home use. And the best thing about the shredder is how quiet it is, you hear a slight whine from the motors, but the loudest thing while using this shredder is the sound of the blades cutting into the paper which is not loud at all. I would definitely recommend this to anyone using this for any non commercial purposes
customer_reviews.author: Suhail S

customer_reviews.title: Good for everyday junk mail shredding
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shredder upon first use. I loved it so much that I burned it out! Like most people, I have been cleaning and reorganizing during quarantine and simply went overboard. The shredder met all of my requirements and it was easy to just keep shredding. It is important to follow the instructions regarding the shred time. Although I will say that the warning light did not come on in any time prior to the machine shutting down. Overall, it is a good shredder for handling regular everyday junk mail.
customer_reviews.author: Kay O.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It shreds so nicely! No issues at all with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Ermie

customer_reviews.title: Amazon should be ashamed for selling this crap.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this shredder 2 months now and it has completely died. I used it 5 or 6 times, never shredding more than 20 pages. What a rip-off. Amazon should be ashamed for selling this crap.
customer_reviews.author: C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Did not get what I paid for!!
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a shredder that would handle paper, credit cards, and staples - just as the description indicates!! Yet the operating manual clearly states this machine is for PAPER ONLY!!! Clear case of false advertising! Do not buy from this company if you are expecting honesty or integrity!
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Swift

customer_reviews.title: Quite loud but does the job
customer_reviews.text: For occasional use at home seems to be quite good. There's no chance to read whatever was shredded, works fine with credit cards or folded paper. I did not try it on more than a few sheets of paper at once and I don't think it's good idea. And it's quite loud, much louder than bigger one I have in my office. It's probably due to gearing and pretty small engine it uses (similarly my small electric screwdriver is much louder than much bigger impact gun under the same load).
customer_reviews.author: Mattia

customer_reviews.title: Paper gets stuck even if only putting one piece of paper through at a time!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this shredder for not even a week and have only sent about 50 pieces of paper total through it. It now isn't working. The is paper stuck in all the blades. Very disappointing considering the other reviews were very good for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Randy J Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It's very efficient and maneuverble
customer_reviews.text: This product replaced a 10+ year old shredder used for personal office use. My previous shredder shredded the same number of pages but was almost double the size making it very hard to lift and position. The Bonsaii is great--works well and is small but not too small. The handle on top of the shredding mechanism makes it easy to move and to empty the basket. It shreds much finer than my previous shredder and therefore even though smaller doesn't require any more frequent emptying of the basket. I think it's a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it is. Little noisy and not easy to just grab and go.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great little shredder. Slightly louder than I would like but I can deal with it. The only real complaint I have is that the top (which has the blades attached to it) doesn’t clip in so the handle that is attached just pulls the top off the bucket. There is no handle for transport So you need to use 2 hands to move it. It’s a minor thing but it does get irritating after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: It works, it shreds to pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Once arrived, I automatically shredded a lot cc mails and unwanted documents. It does the job of making cross cuts. Even with staples, it cuts through. Half of the bucket got full then. It's missing a star because it sounds like the motor is having a hard time cutting through, tho it still did. Some shredded paper got stuck between the teeth. I will come back for my review if anything happens. $40 isn't that bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Just Yan

customer_reviews.title: Do the job for home use, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my intended use. Surprisingly quite. Good for 3 to 5 sheet of paper, it struggle if more is use , noise remain low and tolerable. In case of clogging, reversing the blade rotation can remedy it. I would suggest a latch or something to keep the wastebasket to inadvertently disengage. For now I uses small tape on each side to keep it in place on lifting the whole unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: We've always purchased cheap shredders and worn them out. I am so happy with this purchase. I shredded paper for 4 hours and this shredder never over heated. I didn't over load it and I spent time pulling staples so it didn't run constantly. But any other shredder would have given out. The only wish I have is that the oil would have been suggested at purchase. I'm waiting for the oil to come so I can keep shredding.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but good shredder
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected but it does a good job so far shredding. The dimensions in the description are accurate but I don’t see how it can hold 3.5 gallons. Overall it’s a good shredder and cuts the pieces pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs on its own even when not using it!
customer_reviews.text: The product definitely does the job but now just a little over a month it just starts running on its own if set to automatic. It is very annoying as when I come in the room and cut the light on or off it will start running also. You can turn it off but I would like to keep it on automatic so it will run when I put paper in it without having to turn it on! 7/10/20. This has stopped working completely now. Not a good buy or I got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: michelle poteat

customer_reviews.title: Solid B+
customer_reviews.text: About right for the money. Not particularly powerful. A bit cumbersome to move and negotiate (no handle, the bin fit is not great). Tends to remain on, shredding, even after the paper is gone through; have had to shut it off manually at times. But the company seems very good, following up on purchase and satisfaction. The above are more notes than complaints but if I had it to do over again, if I had only the same money, I would buy it again; but if I could afford it, I would get a higher level from a more established brand.
customer_reviews.author: american

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Wonderful Shredder
customer_reviews.text: It is the best shredder I have ever had and I have had several different brands before - but this is the BEST! Very quiet, does not overheat and performs beautifully. Cuts small enough pieces so that I feel protected and is super easy to empty the waste container without leaving a big mess as my old ones did. Very glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT 14 SHEETS, MORE LIKE 3.
customer_reviews.text: The description of this item says you can shred up to 14 sheets at a time. NOT TRUE. The instruction sheet that comes with the product says do not shred anywhere near the 14 recommended sheets, otherwise the machine won't last long. So I worked my way up to see how many I could shred. I got to ONLY 4 SHEETS before the machine started to clog. All I'm shredding are normal weight paper that your taxes are on. Also, when I empty the bin, the shredding teeth are stuffed with paper. There's no way to remove the stuck shredded paper except with your fingers. And the teeth are very sharp! I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, well built paper shredder for home use
customer_reviews.text: Shredded 4 years of documents over 4 days. This shredder did a great job of shredding paper into tiny pieces. Never jammed or overheated even after 1 hour continuous feed, but I never put more than 7 sheets at a times, often less. Very high quality, sturdy, and sharp shredding teeth. Well built; should last a very long time. Very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed customer
customer_reviews.text: This product advertised as being able to shred 12 sheets at a time. In spite of feeding only 5 or 6 sheets at a time the rollers do not release the paper and end up jamming between shredder and frame. I am not a heavy user and yet I have had to disassemble and clean the rollers twice since I purchased this shredder. Next time I will not buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: 4 minutes every 40
customer_reviews.text: What the product descriptin doesn't tell you, is that you can only use this machine for 4 minutes at a time (after which it must rest for 40). This is fine if you shred a few docs a week. However, I did a major purge. It took us several days to shred our mountain of docs because of the limitations. By the time we finally finished our job the shredder was lagging. Not only couldn't it take 8 sheets, it could no longer take 6, or even 4. If I had known I would not have picked this shredder.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie L.

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Works well over all, like a typical paper shredder. Says it does credit cards but seems to struggle a bit. Container is small. Comes with a handle which I thought would be great for portability but the top doesn’t “lock” into the base so grabbing the handle to lift only lifts up the top of the shredder and. It the base. That was disappointing Nd. Still have to carry lifting by the bottom base.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but quite slow
customer_reviews.text: The reviews led me to believe that this was "heavy duty". I have no trouble shredding packets of paper or credit cards, but it is quite slow. For a fast paced office, this does not cut it. I want to insert and walk away when shredding sensitive docs. I feel like i have to stand there and wait for it all to process in. Not overly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Urban

customer_reviews.title: This thing is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Paper shredders seem to have tiny motors these days, this is no exception. It stalled shredding envelopes with 2 pages of paper inside. Im sorry but that is a joke. The companies selling these machines are extorting people at these costs, this thing is not worth even $20. Its useless. I sent it back for an easy refund but its amazon so thats to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: dhayes

customer_reviews.title: My Best Shredder Yet
customer_reviews.text: Best shredder of the 3 I’ve had. Others have clogged up more than this one. I’ve had a marathon day of shredding on one occasion and the shredder shuts off when it senses it is getting hot. Let it sit for half an hour and shred some more. I do unplug it when it shuts off and needs a rest, just to be ultra-safe. So much easier to empty the bin than my others were. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley N

customer_reviews.title: Very good powerful shredder
customer_reviews.text: This is the best heavy duty home business quality shredder I have had. Never over heats or jams. It crunches through very thick sensitive letter after thick letter, one after the other non-stop. I often do 8 or more (thick) letters back to back. Never jams. And the removable shredded paper bin makes it super easy to dump. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Low quality and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I just received this yesterday. The quality of the unit is poor--light weight, small basket. I replaced an Amazon shredder that I paid twenty dollars less for but after two years the switch went out. However, that unit was heavy, a large basket and much more mobile. I would have ordered another of the Amazon units had it been available. This is a piece of junk. Don't order this.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Love this paper shredder
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift. I wouldn't have paid for this nice of one because the cheaper ones work well enough. I LOVE it. I can easily slide out the paper holder and dump it without getting shredded paper all over the floor. I can shred several pages at once without dragging down the motor and having it turn off on me for getting too hot. I would definitely buy it again or buy it for otheres.
customer_reviews.author: David Barnish

customer_reviews.title: Brand New out of the Box - No Power
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this from Amazon 2 days ago, and opened it immediately this morning when I received it, since I really needed it, and it does not power on, even when I tried multiple outlets. * I already called the company, left a message, and even emailed them, but still have not heard back
customer_reviews.author: Rich Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I paid more for this thinking it would last longer than my last shredder. Alas, it started making funny grinding noises after 1.5 years and today some plastic parts disintegrated into many tiny pieces, dropping into the shredder basket. It gets only light use at home. I suspect I’m out of luck in terms of warranty. For the price I expected more than 5 years of use or at least 3x the lifespan of a cheap shredder . Given this experience, I may return to buying cheap shredders and plan on replacing frequently. I do use the lubricating sheets...
customer_reviews.author: Pitohui

customer_reviews.title: Faulty after just a few months.  Will try another brand.
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to review such a product. It is a replacement for a shredder that caught fire. So far, this one seems to be made well....time will tell. Well, time has come to tell. This shredder has failed. The Auto feed stopped working. I can still use it manually, but spent too much on this one to not have all of the functions working. Will eventually trash this one, and try another company
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Shoop

product_meta.title: Bonsaii 14-Sheet Cross-Cut Heavy Duty Paper Shredder, 30-Minute Continuous Running Time, Credit Card/Staples Shredders for Office, Quiet Shredding Machine with Jam Proof System (C169-B)
product_meta.description:
Size:14-Sheet Cross-CutAdvanced Cooling Technology: 30 MINUTES CONTINUOUS RUNNING TIME
Bonsaii EverShred C169-B will continuous shredding 30 minutes normally , which means 3500 sheets of paper can be destroyed completely without stopping and will only need 10 minutes to cool down with patented cooling technology to restart work. This design will save much time for you when mass documents waiting to shred and you will never feel so easy to get back to your life with the peace of mind that your confidential information are safe. 

Jam Protection System 
This office shredder is equipped with an ultra-reliable and ultra-durable automatic anti-jam system. Advanced jam detection automatically reverses the machine when over-loading to prevent the jam happening in the first place. Bonsaii C169-B solution with highly sophisticated and reliable anti-jam technology can protect the machine from overloading.

Have the Security You Want
The machine is enhanced shredding ability with innovative technology to shred up to 14 sheets of paper (Letter Size, 20lb) into 13/64 x 1-37/64 inches tiny pieces (Security Level P-3) at a single pass. The shredding speed reaches 1.9m per minute and an 22cm entry slot can accept all letter and legal-sized documents. When shredding small material like envelops or receipts, please insert them through the middle of the feed opening. 

1-Year Warranty
The warranty of this unit is 12 months from the date of first purchase, provided that the machine has been used appropriately, which ensures the least worries and best experience that we could provide for our dearest customers. NOTE: A few pieces of shredded paper may be found inside the shredder blades or the waste basket due to the 100% full shredding test in the process of manufacturing to ensure quality. If you are not satisfied, please contact customer service for further assistance.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty shredder keeps working up to 30 minutes without stopping based on the patented cooling system, destroys about 3500 sheets of paper, ideal for your large office and home use
Crosscut paper shredder, max 14 sheets of paper shredding capacity (letter size, 75g/m²), shreds paper into tiny particles measuring 13/64 x 1-37/64 inches to your personal information safe
Jam proof system with auto start/stop and manual reverse functions, helps you clean up the paper jams easily and free from the frustration of jamming
4.8 gallons pull-out wastebasket for less frequent and easy emptying, and the transparent window makes it easy to see when the bin is full of paper scraps
Overheating and overloading thermal protection with LED indicators, 1-year limited warranty, protects your interests all aspects

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,054 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
